projects.testDescription: This project involved testing a complete e-commerce application using Cucumber with Page Object Model (POM). I integrated custom reporting tools and executed end-to-end functional, API, performance, and UI testing. The project successfully uncovered 98 critical bugs that were affecting product performance and customer experience.
projects.feedback: Thank you so much, Chris! This was my hobby project, and you helped transform it into a reliable testing framework. With your detailed bug reports and requirement suggestions, I can now elevate this application to a production-level service.
